__TOC__

This is a page to collect schools in Belgium using some form of Free/Open Source Software. Some of them might be used as case studies on the <nowiki>[[../| Vlaamse Onderwijsdagen]]</nowiki>

=== Primary schools ===

=== Secondary schools ===
* <nowiki>[[http://www.sint-pieterscollege.be/|Sint-Pieterscollege, Jette]]</nowiki> (<nowiki>[[http://www.klasse.be/archieven/archieven.taf?actie=detail&nr=12074|article]]</nowiki>): Mambo ContentMS, Moodle CourseMS, Linux, OpenOffice.org, Gimp
* Onze-Lieve-Vrouwe-instituut in Tienen highschool TSO-BSO: almost :)

=== Higher education ===
* <nowiki>[[http://uhasselt.be|Hasselt University, Diepenbeek]]</nowiki>: Fedora (dual boot with Windows)
* <nowiki>[[http://www.esat.kuleuven.be]]</nowiki>: Fedora (dual boot with Windows)
* <nowiki>[[http://itf.fys.kuleuven.be|Institute for Theoretical Physics, KULeuven]]</nowiki>: Ubuntu 6.10
* Hogeschool Antwerpen: Departement Ontwerpwetenschappen; Mainly servers
* UGent: <nowiki>[[http://minerva.ugent.be/|Minerva]]</nowiki> digital learning environment powered by <nowiki>[[http://www.dokeos.com/|Dokeos]]</nowiki> (this used by every single student), and some servers too

=== Lessons of linux for adults ===
* Technisch Instituut van het Kempens Bekken (Volwassen onderwijs, ubuntu) http://users.pandora.be/jos.nys/tikb/informatica/informatica_linux.htm
* LBC Volwassenonderwijs (Sint-Niklaas, Vrije-software, Ubuntu?) http://www.lbc9100.be/
* <nowiki>[[http://www.intecbrussel.be/|Intec Brussel]]</nowiki> ict training for adults
* <nowiki>[[http://www.syntrawest.be/|Syntra West]]</nowiki> (uses Ubuntu)
* <nowiki>[[http://www.snt.be/|SNT Brugge]]</nowiki> (also see the <nowiki>[[http://sntlinux.webhop.org/|teacher's page]]</nowiki>)
* <nowiki>[[http://www.bis.vlaanderen.be/start.htm|BIS - Begeleid Individueel Studeren]]</nowiki> from the Flemish Community Ministry of Education has a Linux course based on Ubuntu

=== Companies ===
* http://www.linux-service.be/onderwijsprodukten.htm
* http://www.linuxschool.be/
